qas.question: Along with the Inns of Chancery, in what inns did British lawyers historically conduct business?
In what city are the Inns of Chancery located?
Outside England, what other country does the legal system founded around the Inns of Court operate in?

context: The <a0_0>Inns of Court<a0_0/> and Inns of Chancery in <a1_0>London<a1_0/> started as ordinary inns where barristers met to do business, but became institutions of the legal profession in England and <a2_0>Wales<a2_0/>.
